txt.en: Travel to Ost Lontir and speak with Gilanor

'The roads are safe enough for us to return to them and ship these much needed provisions to Dol Amroth. I shall tell your deeds to my husband upon his return to the Havens. Rossaran will surely want to meet you one day.

'You must make haste to Ost Lontir where the caretakers of Amon Lontir reside. I am sure they are already aware of the situation at Edhellond.

'You could be of much needed assistance to the people of Ost Lontir in dealing with this greater corsair threat. May your journeys be prosperous, [placeholder].'

'I have grown wary of accepting help from those I do not know, traveller. Yet, I fear the time has passed to be so discriminative....\n\n'If you would aid us here in Ost Lontir, I will see you rewarded.'
Now that Tadrent is safe, Bruidis has asked you to go to Ost Lontir and learn more about the corsair threat in Edhellond.
Ost Lontir is located in Belfalas, in the foothills of Emyn Ernil.\n\nYou should speak with Ost Lontir's leader, Gilanor.
